name: Parse Server Example
description: An example Parse API server using the parse-server module

APP_ID.description: A unique identifier for your app.

MASTER_KEY.description: A key that overrides all permissions. Keep this secret.

SERVER_URL.description: URL to connect to your Heroku instance (update with your app's name + PARSE_MOUNT)

DASHBOARD_USER_NAME.description: The username you will use to login to Parse Dashboard

DASHBOARD_PASSWORD.description: The password you will use to login to Parse Dashboard
